#summary Definition of t_data_source

= t_data_source =

The t_data_source table defines unique data source. Data sources are used in t_feed to define where data originates from and where data is being sent to. 

|| *Key* || *Name* || *Type* || *Null* || *Description* ||
|| PK || data_source_id || varchar(10) || No || Uniquely defines the data source ||
|| || description || varchar(250) || No || Description of the data source ||
 
= Examples = 

|| *data_source_id* || *description* ||
|| acme || Acme student information data source ||
|| qagen || Worlds #1 selling test generation software ||
